doc: The pathname to a SDF file containing the chemical system for which the basis set should be generated.
The collection of rules used to define the basis set.
Set the value to True to permit that some atoms are not matched by basis set assignation rules.
The pathname to the file where to print the basis set.
The format for writing basis set. Possible values are 'Gaussian', or 'NWChem'.
Sets the amount of log messages. Values larger than 0 will make the worker write more and more detailed log reports.
